name: The Spiral Village
description:
THE SPIRAL VILLAGE

The spiral village is a student project that we made over the course of 7 weeks for the Game Design 4: Level Design course at Uppsala University. In the Spiral Village, you descend into the madness that has taken hold of the village of Laarsip. Will you find your missing friend or get pulled into the village?

The Team:
  • Anna Hatzl - Artist
    • https://hawtsheep.itch.io/
  • Ottilia Hedberg - Artist
    • https://ottilia.itch.io/
  • Rens van Eldijk - Producer + blueprint programmer
    • https://roldon.itch.io/
  • Ilias Keramidas - Level design
    • https://liakouris.itch.io/
  • Disa Nordström - Level design + blueprint programmer
    • https://dizuz.itch.io/
  • Erika Lönn - Artist
    • https://kitthly.itch.io/
  • Leo Wognum - Sound design
    • https://wognum.itch.io/
